name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: As a Senior Quarkus Engineer with 9+ years of experience, I excel in building resilient applications employing **Quarkus**, **RESTful**, **SOAP**, and **Clean Code** principles. My expertise encompasses TDD, utilizing **JUnit**, **Mockito**, and **RestAssured** for robust testing practices, alongside proficiency in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and CI/CD tools such as **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions**. I specialize in microservices architecture, implementing patterns like **CQRS**, **SAGA**, and **Event Sourcing** to enhance application scalability and maintainability. Additionally, I have substantial experience with cloud services and databases, including **Redis**, **MongoDB**, and **RDBMS** technologies within **Linux** environments. My strong background in distributed systems is complemented by hands-on skills in **Apache Kafka** and user management with **Keycloak**. Known for delivering high-quality software solutions, I am committed to optimizing development processes while fostering cross-team collaboration to drive projects to successful completion.
